message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for the offer Alice. I'm very interested in the product, but $10000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay at this time. I'm prepared to offer $8500. I believe this is a fair price that would be beneficial for both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for 9500.
